AuthenticationRequest

AuthenticationResponse

JwtTokenValidationFilter
A once per request filter that verifies that the user id from the jwt token in the Authorization header is a valid user that is enabled, has permissions and allows the ant matchers in WebSecurityConfiguration to verify the user's role.
JwtUsernameAndPasswordAuthenticationFilter
